p.s: The novel Gun Love written by Jennifer Clement and published in 2019, tells us a story about the fourteen yearsyear old Pearl and her 31 year old Mothermother, Margot France.

They lifelive in a mercuryMercury in a parking lot of the Indian Water Trailer Park in nowhere of Florida after Margot runaway in fear of her abusive father and in order to protect herself and her newborn baby she got in a teenage pregnancy.
Suddenly Margot died and Pearl is brought to a foster home where she meets two other foster children called Helen and Leo.
In this excerpt Pearl discribesdescribes Helen's situation detaield, because she has a very interesting past.
Helen really does not know who she is, because she switched her homes for 17 times.
She says she has two different mothers and was also born in two different places.
Even her religion switched a few times.
In fact of so many homes she got many friends, which she wants to call actually and have a small talk.
On the other side there was also a darker part of her past.
Sometimes she does not lived with the best conditions, what means she does not got her call of nature like enough food or a bed to sleep.
Right now at the moment Helen lives with Leo and Pearl in a foster home together.
